Articles.Content:
I was inspired by the "Gemini style moon landing" challenge to create this. The point of the challenge is to use a Gemini replica, Apollo replica, or stock craft in a novel way. Build the MOL, perform the planned Apollo venus flyby, go to duna with a Learstar, whatever! The only requirements are:

  1. You must actually carry out the mission.
  2. The mission must be novel, no using an Apollo replica for a Mun landing, etc.
  3. The mission can be one that was planned in the real world.
  4. To qualify as a Gemini replica, the craft must seat two kerbals, look like a Gemini capsule, and be able to survive re-entry. It must be smaller than a mk1-2 pod, and must have a docking port.
  5. To qualify as an Apollo replica, the craft must seat three kerbals, look like Apollo, and be able to survive re-entry. A good guideline is that it should be about the size of a mk1-2 pod. It can be a mk1-2 pod. It must have a docking port.
  6. You may use any of the proposed modifications to either craft, such as making a paragliding Gemini.
  7. There is no score, but if I receive too many entries to list conveniently, I will pick five finalists in each category to display. The remaining entries will be in spoiler tags.

My entry coming soon.
